oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: National Barn Dance - WLS performances - 1942-04-10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Home recorded National Barn Dance performances, featuring Prairie Ramblers, Arkie The Arkansas Woodchopper, Smiley Burnette, Cumberland Ridge Runners, Marjorie Lynn, and Doc Hopkins on April 10, 1942 on radio station WLS (Chicago, IL).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Prairie Ramblers; Arkie The Arkansas Woodchopper; Smiley Burnette; Cumberland Ridge Runners; Marjorie Lynn; Doc Hopkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Jack Stilwell talks -- Jack Stilwell introduces Prairie Ramblers -- Ragtime Cowboy Joe (Prairie Ramblers) -- Press Along To The Big Corral (Red Foley) -- Get Along Little Doggies (Arkie) -- Jack Stilwell talks -- Jack Stilwell introduces Smiley Burnette -- Jack Stilwell and Smiley Burnette talk -- Ridin' Down The Canyon (Smiley Burnette) -- Jack Stilwell talks -- Jack Holden introduces Cumberland Ridge Runners -- Ol' Red (Cumberland Ridge Runners) -- Jack Stilwell introduces Marjorie Lynn -- My Adobe Hacienda (Marjorie Lynn) -- Jack Stilwell introduces Doc Hopkins -- How Many Biscuits Can You Eat (Doc Hopkins) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: National Barn Dance (Radio program); WLS (Radio station : Chicago, Ill.); Prairie Ramblers; Foley, Red, 1910-1968; Arkie the Arkansas Woodchopper; Burnette, Smiley, 1911-1967; Cumberland Ridge Runners (Musical group); Lynn, Marjorie; Hopkins, Doc, 1900-1988;
